questions.question: hai
questions.answer: Hello, Welcome to Wonder store. How may I help you today?

questions.question: what is wonder store?
questions.answer: Wonder store is an e-commerce food processing and delivery shop which produces and delivers mouth watering food items of your choice at your doorstep. We are located at vaduthala, Ernakulam district, kerala state, India.

questions.question: is delivery option available?
questions.answer: Yes, we do have delivery options. However, our delivery is limited to a 10 km radius around our store location.

questions.question: what are the main products or trending products?
questions.answer: Our best-selling products include chicken and mutton biriyani, momos, cutlet, and masala dosa. You can also find seasonal and trending food items in the trending section of our website.

questions.question: where can i find the offer products?
questions.answer: You can find products with ongoing offers in the 'Offers' section of our website.

questions.question: what are the trending products?
questions.answer: Our trending products include:Butter Chicken,Biryani,Chicken 65Paneer Tikka, MasalaTandoori, ChickenChilli, Chicken,These dishes are popular among our customers and are highly rated for their taste and quality.

questions.question: where is the location of the store?
questions.answer: Our store is located at Vaduthala, Ernakulam district, Kerala state, India.

questions.question: do you have dining options?
questions.answer: Yes, we have an ambient lake view dining option available at our location. You can enjoy your meal while taking in the scenic beauty of the lake.

questions.question: do you provide catering products?
questions.answer: Yes, we do provide catering products. We offer a wide range of catering options to suit your needs, whether it's for a small gathering or a large event. Our catering menu includes a variety of dishes, including appetizers, main courses, desserts, and beverages.

questions.question: how to contact you?
questions.answer: You can contact us through our website, phone number, or email id. Our contact information is as follows:

questions.question: thank you
questions.answer: You're welcome! Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
